thisIsAComment: This file contains all keys for all steps of sequence.sh
thisIsAlsoAComment1: signal_folder: home of where all subfolders are located in this case for bg
thisIsAlsoAComment2: bg_folder: DONT USE IN THIS ONE pure background TPs (input to add_backgrounds)
thisIsAlsoAComment3: All subfolders are determined automatically and will start with 'products_prefix', but can be overriden here with keys tps_folder/tps_bg_folder
